description: Police say a man is in hospital with head and arm injuries after the suspected stabbing on Saturday.
title: Man in hospital after suspected Grangetown stabbing
title_page: Man in hospital after suspected Grangetown stabbing - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been taken to hospital after a suspected stabbing, police have said.
It happened at about 15:30 GMT in Grangetown, Redcar and Cleveland.
Cleveland Police said officers were called to Birchington Avenue after reports of a stabbing.
The man suffered head and arm injuries in the attack, said a force spokesperson.
